Module Nmea__Sentence

exception Invalid_sentence
type mag_var = float * Nmea.Coord.ew
type gpgga = {
time : float;
coord : Nmea.Coord.t;
quality : int;
sat_n : int;
hdop : float;
alt : float;
geoid_height : float;
station_id : string;
}
type gpgll = {
time : float;
coord : Nmea.Coord.t;
status : bool;
}
type gprmc = {
time : float;
coord : Nmea.Coord.t;
sog : float;
cmg : float;
mag_var : mag_var;
status : bool;
}
type sat = {
prn : int;
elev_dgr : int;
azimuth : int;
snr_db : int;
}
type gpgsv = {
msg_n : int;
msg_i : int;
sv_n : int;
sats : sat list;
}
type gpgsa = {
auto : bool;
fix : int;
prns : int list;
pdop : float;
hdop : float;
vdop : float;
}
type t =
| GPGLL of gpgll
| GPGGA of gpgga
| GPRMC of gprmc
| GPGSV of gpgsv
| GPGSA of gpgsa

sentence type

val to_string : t -> string

to_string s returns an human readable string for the given sentence

val time_to_unix : int -> float

time_to_unix t transforms nmea time format to unixtime

val datetime_to_unix : int -> int -> float

datetime_to_unix d t transforms nmea datetime format to unixtime
